topic.title: Here is a great video about debates
topic.body:
Here it is so you can talk about it. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NXjH3duyLKc

1548908171_17j49peu8sboiBjDKxXqNEbNCioF4.body: When someone asks why Decentralizing is good for people. You should know how to properly defend the idea and show why you believe it.

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
> [quantumworld](#comment_185_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): Reply speed test!!!  Awesome!!

That's good

> [quantumworld](#comment_186_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): Fantastic, about 7 min response time to me.

just saw this

> [quantumworld](#comment_186_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): Fantastic, about 7 min response time to me.

I was slow on the draw.

> [quantumworld](#comment_188_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): Zeronet is passing tests for an Ultra News site. This is cool.

You do have to worry about comments getting lost with a lot of people typing. or comments showing up in the wrong order. but those are problems for other people.

> [quantumworld](#comment_189_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): That is ok. The speed so far of this p2p zeronet is really good. Its passing all of my limited tests on putting a kick ass news site on zeronet.

You've got a news site on here?

> [quantumworld](#comment_190_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): Not yet.  I will be bringing back a news site that was taken down several years ago that was getting over 2 mill views a day on average. It was force removed by CNN. Same shit they arepulled on Infowars .

What was it called?
